FW SAVINGS PLAN TRANSITION PERIOD ENDS For All Employees who Participate in the Enron Corp Savings PlanHere was the communication that went out most recently Hope that helps Original Message From Enron NRON On Behalf Of Corporate NRON Sent Wednesday November PM To All Enron Employees United States NRON Subject SAVINGS PLAN TRANSITION PERIOD ENDS For All Employees who Participate in the Enron Corp Savings Plan The Savings Plan Transition Period Ends Early We have been working closely with Hewitt Associates to get you access to your Savings Plan account before November and are pleased to announce that the internet site went live as of AM yesterday morning November Log on to benefitsenroncom and check out the new website you will enjoy the new features Once again we have appreciated your patience during the transition period EnronBenefits keeping pace with your lifestyle

FW promotion infosmith PST FYI Original Message From Davis Jeff D Sent Friday August AM To Melodick Kim Subject RE promotion info Kim The candidates are scheduled to be interviewed late next week Please let me know if you should have any questions Jeff Davis Associate Analyst Recruiting Original Message From Melodick Kim Sent Friday August AM To Davis Jeff D Subject FW promotion info Jeff can you tell me the status of the inteview process for Eric Original Message From Gilbertsmith Doug Sent Thursday August PM To Melodick Kim Subject promotion info Kim As I am lacking info regarding Eric Saibis promotion I am unable to give him his review Please let me know Thanks Doug

Performance Improvement Plansmith PST Doug we will need to have this document along with the evaluation reviewed by legal prior to presenting to the employee Attached is a Performance Improvement Plan for your employees who rated in the bottom cluster The steps below outline the instructions for completing this form If you have any questions please contact your HR Representative Supervisors are encouraged to consider employee input before finalizing the PIP The PIP should address the specific performance areas and examples provided in the employees evaluation All PIPs should be reviewed by your Human Resources generalist before being presented to the employee PerformanceDevelopment Area This is the specific area in which the employees demonstrated performance needs to improve or a significant area where additional development is needed These should be stated in specific objective and behavioral terms Common descriptors have been provided for the supervisor to copypaste into the Performance Improvement Plan or to modify as needed See attachment Specific Action Required The desired behavior or action of employee This should usually be a goal or milestone that can be measured or evaluated Completion Date Each specific action in the PIP will require varying time periods for completion Some improvement areas may need to be immediate such as reducing absenteeism or eliminating inappropriate comments Other areas will take longer for the employee to complete such as enhancing technical knowledge Supervisors are encouraged to avoid lengthy completion dates while giving the employee sufficient time to demonstrate improvement The completion date should coincide with any key milestones or events that may be tied to the specific action required A drop down window is provided with dates Persons Responsible In most cases the supervisor the employee or both will appear in this column There are situations where another person is assisting the employee to reach a goal or milestone For example an employee who needs to strengthen his technical skills might shadow a team member thus that team member would be listed in this column along with the employee This usually encompasses anyone that is critical in providing time resources or support for the employee to improve in that particular performancedevelopment area

FW Pre PRC Meeting Cc PST Please note the meeting time has changed from pm to pm Original Message From Melodick Kim Sent Wednesday June AM To Presto Kevin M Bentley Corry Will Lloyd Hernandez Juan Baughman Jr Don Sturm Fletcher J Davis Mark Dana Herndon Rogers Arora Harry Gilbertsmith Doug Cc Black Tamara Jae Slone Jeanie Brasseaux Ben Subject Pre PRC Meeting Please mark your calendars for a East Power Trading Pre PRC Meeting to be held June th at pmpm in Room EBC Prior to the meeting you will receive a spreadsheet that will contain the names of the individuals that you are listed to represent as of the cut off date of I will need you to review the names to ensure that we have captured the information accurately Bear in mind that I am aware that changes have been made in regards to your direct reports since then Individuals that have been with the company less than months will not be rated however they will go through the feedback and performance review process Items to bring to the meeting include Copies of the supervisor feedback reports from the PEP system if you have difficulty retrieving this information please contact me A list of each employees accomplishments also listed in PEP under the employee self review section A prerank for each employee under your supervision Note it is important that you review the employees accomplishments in the PEP system prior to attending a PRC meeting as this information will show up on the screen during the meeting If an employee has not entered this information into the PEP system please meet with them in advance to obtain this information in order for you to be prepared Feel free to contact me should you have additional questions

FW EES Torontopst Just making sure that you are aware Original Message From Vu Nancy H Sent Tuesday August AM To Melodick Kim Callahan Timothy Subject FW EES Toronto FYI Original Message From Sabine Marc Sent Tuesday August AM To Williams Jaime Irvin Steve Alatorre Jaime Perez Agustin Gonzalez Victor Lenci Enrique Reyes Alejandra Cantu Gabriela Cerezo Pilar Benavides Julissa Martinez Barbara Perez Grace Rodriguez Miguel Vu Nancy H Rimbau Robert W Subject EES Toronto Hey everyone Just wanted to let you know that I have decided to accept a position with Enron Energy Services Canada in the Toronto office I will be moving back to mi rancho at the end of August I wish everyone the very best in their future endeavors Thanks Marc

RE Confidential AA PRC Resultspst Hi got your message We will have it to you before pm Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Friday July PM To Melodick Kim Subject FW Confidential AA PRC Results I will be leaving at pm so please get me the files asap Original Message From Deffner Joseph Sent Friday July AM To Kitchen Louise Subject FW Confidential AA PRC Results Catherine has been in Global inance for Enron Americas for the past year She has been ranked a Category during yearend and midyear PRC She is responsible for the financial modeling of all the greenfield project development opportunities being pursued by Origination She has learned to articulate the banks concerns with the projects and equipment to be financed within ENext and other structures to both the originators and accounting The successful effort Origination has had this year with developments has provided tremendous document flow which has allowed Catherine to develop her document review skills from both a financing and commercial perspective The growth in maturity she has experienced driven by her deal flow has made her one of the core go to junior people in my group when a deal calls for financial analysis She has been performing at the manager level for six months and is seen as a leader among the junior staff in the group Original Message From Slone Jeanie Sent Thursday July AM To Deffner Joseph Subject RE Confidential AA PRC Results Louise and John will be reviewing these early next week Since Catherine is eligible and has a rating I do not believe this will be an issue Louise has requested that each manager write a brief statement about why the employee should be promoted Please submit it to me by noon tomorrow if possible I apologise for the late notice The need for a written summary just came up If this is an issue just let me know and we can resolve another way Thanks Original Message From Deffner Joseph Sent Thursday July AM To Slone Jeanie Subject FW Confidential AA PRC Results Jeanie is there anything additional I need to do with regards to Catherine Clarks promotion Original Message From Bosien Teresa Sent Wednesday July PM To Deffner Joseph Subject Confidential AA PRC Results Below are the final PRC rankings for the Analysts and or Associates who were assigned to you for the midyear PRC process Please communicate these results to the appropriate supervisor PRC reviews with the Analysts and Associates should be completed by early August and the signed evaluation forms should be returned to me at EBb The Program recommends that if asked the supervisor should provide the actual ranking to the Analyst or Associate In addition we recommend that the PRC representative be involved in providing feedback to the Analyst or Associate Name PRC Level BU Hire Date Supervisor Ranking Promotion Edmonds Marcus R Analyst ENA Ms Lisa Bills No Clark Catherine J Associate ENA Ms Lisa Bills Liu Ying Associate ENA Ms Lisa Bills No Catherine is eligible for promotion to Manager waiting on business unit approval Contact Jeanie Slone if you need additional information Thank you for your participation in this important process Terry Bosien Human Resource Manager Associate Analyst Program

Commerical Support PRC meeting June pst Welcome back I wanted to send you this note to let you know we are planning to hold the Commercial Support PRC Meeting for ENA tomorrow June at pm at the Hyatt in the Cottonwood Room The following peer groups will be discussed Specialist Sr Specialist Commercial Support Manager Commercial Support Sr Director Admin roles will not be discussed The primary areas I see going into the meeting that may stimulate discussion historically have been the Sr Specialist callibration and the promotion nominations in this group Promotion nominations will ultimately be subject to Office of the Chair approval While I believe it would be advantageous to have you present in the meeting your attendance is optional Please let me know if you have any questions

RE PRC Mtgs for Louise Cc Tammie sorry it has taken so long to respond The meeting dates and times have been changing rapidly and I wanted to make certain the information was fairly firm There are two additional meetings that Louise will need to be aware of since she has individuals in Power that will be reviewed She can make the decision on whether she needs to attend either of these meeting While I believe that the Technical Meeting should have adequate BU representation if Louise feels strongly that she would like to attend she should contact Jeanie Slone x as soon as possible The ENA Commercial Support PRC will be held this THURSDAY JUNE beginning at pm in the Cottonwood room at the Hyatt Commercial Support Specialists Sr Specialists and Managers will be reviewed If you have any questions or scheduling conflicts please contact Jeanie Slone at X The Technical Meeting for ENAEGM has been combined w EEOS The meeting will take two days The schedule for the meetings is June and nd Further information will be forthcoming shortly Original Message From Schoppe Tammie Sent Thursday June AM To Melodick Kim Subject PRC Mtgs for Louise Importance High Hi Kim I wanted to confirm the PRC meetings Louise should be attending This is what I have on her calendar ENA Commercial PRC VP Preranking MD Preranking Final VP PRC at St Regis Hotel Can you please confirm these Thanks a bunch Tammie Have a great day

performance management supervisor for Jaime Alatorrepst Louise I spoke with Max Yzaguirre yesterday who told me that you had a conversation with him about handling the mexico performance management process in your absence Is that the case or do you want to remain the supervisor in PEP for Jamie Alatorre Can you please advise so I may correct the information in PEP Thanks a million Hope you and the new baby are doing well

HR rep information Cc Hi Louise My name is Kim Melodick I am the HR Manager for the East Power Team I wanted to supply you with a way to contact me should you need assistance I am currently working on projects related to partnering with the team to assist in meeting their business goals I will follow up next week to see if we might have a chance to sit down and discuss your key objectives for Power and specific expectations I will also share with you what I am currently working on In the meantime here are some numbers to reach me Kim Melodick work pager cell home EB locations B and C

RE Follow up on hiring issues last week Cc My only concern is that John I am told spoke to gas and power folks at his staff meeting a while back on the process on transfers As long as they are rated a or higher in PRC then they did not need to have it approved Most go through HR however some we find out after the fact I am just trying to make sure we could meet your expectation Do you want to say something at your next staff meeting Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Tuesday September PM To Melodick Kim Cc Jones Robert W HR Exec Subject RE Follow up on hiring issues last week Sensitivity Confidential You do not need to send any note to any people just make sure we see them all This change applies to Gas and Power Original Message From Melodick Kim Sent Tuesday September AM To Kitchen Louise Cc Jones Robert W HR Exec Subject Follow up on hiring issues last week Sensitivity Confidential Louise prior to you sending me the revised guidelines on transfershires last week I wanted to give you details on the folks that were already in process before the change Steve Bartlet received a transfer offer from Lloyd Don Miller in asset market effective Don had indicated that he had planned to speak to you Monday He did considerable investigation on this employee to ascertain that he would be a fit for the group The employee was rated a at midyear Dave Ingram was hired by Dana Davis to do realtime trading at the senior specialist level He was a transfer from EBS as a redeployed employee Feedback was positive and he was rated a at mid year and excellent at yearend Eric Simpson was hired to work for Fletch Sturm as a commerical director He was rated at midyear and a at yearend As per the email I recceived from Kevin Presto I am told that both you and John are aware Berney Aucoin in EWS made an offer to an analyst out of the program for a specialist level flat compensation Rogers Herndon approved as this employee was rated a at midyear however they feel in the past that he was not appropriately guided at EWS They feel that they can assist in turning this employee around and have developed a Performance Improvement Plan Robert Jones is aware Steve Irvin was in the process of making an offer to Carlos Alatorre for the Monterrey office I believe that you are aware as this employee would be a transfer from EOL I am awaiting a response from Steve on the status I will be sending out a note to Kevin Dave Don Steve Rogers and both Jaimes to let them know about the change in process on what you would like to be included on going forward
performance review follow uppst Just a note to let you know that performance reviews are due on you direct reports Please let me know if you need assistance

analysis of mexico contractor issuepst Jaime Williams telephoned today to follow up on a variety of issues He inquired about the results of the PRC for his employees which I can provide given you concur and he would like to have a copy of the analysis that was done on the contractors we had working in Mexico that he originally was interested in considering employment He appears to have some questions on the analysis Are you comfortable with me providing a copy to him

RE Mexicopst I have been attempting to reach Jaime Alatorre to obtain his accomplishments and have update his profile with no luck both voicemail and emails have been sent Did he send it directly to you The rest of Mexico is in the binder integrated into the mix Hope that helps Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Thursday July AM To Melodick Kim Cc Schoppe Tammie Subject Mexico The files are great thankyou very much Could you put together a separate file specifically on all the Mexico people for Monday incorporating the emails we have received from Steve Jaime and Jaime Thanks

Preranking informationMexicopst Louise I have just sent an email to follow up with Steve Irvin and Jaime Williams to obtain their preranking clusters on their direct reports I will need to obtain your preranking for both Steve and Jaime as well Let me know your thoughts and I will gladly enter it into the PEP system

Commerical Hire ProposalJoe DesChamps Cc Bruce Sukaly would like to consider a candidate for a commerical hire for Origination in Janet Dietrichs organization Here are the details Position Commerical Manager Proposed Salary Relocation Required Reporting To Bruce Sukaly VP ERCOT Region Please let me know if you need further information

merit increase issues to consider for EPowerbelow are several issues I wanted to bring to your attention prior to finalizing merit increases for East Power I have also given David Oxley the same information in order for you to discuss this morning when you meet Call me if you have any questions M Dana Daviss employment agreement will expire in February I imagine we will want to renew with the new salary on the employment agreement K Presto would like to recommendation that we give him a increase Rogers Herndon s employment agreement will expire September Do we want to renew earlier and roll the base salary changes if any into the employment agreement Kevin Presto would like to give him a increase Who will be responsible for John Zufferlis increase if any since he transferred to Canada and now has been promoted to VP Rob Benson was given a significant increase in the global comp system at the insistence of KPresto Kevin states that John Lavorato indicated to him that Benson needed to be taken care of With that being said Kevin would like to bring him up more in line with a commerical director which he was just promoted to His employment agreement will expire So would it also make sense to delete him from the merit database and renew an employment agreement rolling in his new salary Finally I need you to decide on Chris Dorlands new salary He is currently making and I have recommended He is an Associate that is being made a commerical manager He was ranked superior and Presto has indicated that he is expecting around Presto finally settled on provided you concur Our plan prior was slightly stagger salaries for individuals as associates promoted to commercial manager based on final rankings strong for excellent for superior The guideline from the program is but is left up to the business unit discretion
follow up on Joe DesChampswanted to know your thoughts on Joe DesChamps I understand you completed a telephone interview with him

merit increase issues to consider for EPowerbelow are several issues I wanted to bring to your attention prior to finalizing merit increases for East Power I have also given David Oxley the same information in order for you to discuss this morning when you meet Call me if you have any questions M Dana Daviss employment agreement will expire in February I imagine we will want to renew with the new salary on the employment agreement K Presto would like to recommendation that we give him a increase Rogers Herndon s employment agreement will expire September Do we want to renew earlier and roll the base salary changes if any into the employment agreement Kevin Presto would like to give him a increase Who will be responsible for John Zufferlis increase if any since he transferred to Canada and now has been promoted to VP Rob Benson was given a significant increase in the global comp system at the insistence of KPresto Kevin states that John Lavorato indicated to him that Benson needed to be taken care of With that being said Kevin would like to bring him up more in line with a commerical director which he was just promoted to His employment agreement will expire So would it also make sense to delete him from the merit database and renew an employment agreement rolling in his new salary Finally I need you to decide on Chris Dorlands new salary He is currently making and I have recommended He is an Associate that is being made a commerical manager He was ranked superior and Presto has indicated that he is expecting around Presto finally settled on provided you concur Our plan prior was slightly stagger salaries for individuals as associates promoted to commercial manager based on final rankings strong for excellent for superior The guideline from the program is but is left up to the business unit discretion

Executive MBA follow up Cc is in response to your recent request for a status update on Sandra Dial and her desire to pursue an executive MBA program at Rice University In follow up to the discussion held with Sandra Dial Sally Beck and myself on April Sally indicated to Sandra that while she strongly supported the decision made regarding the executive MBA program she agreed to review the proposal of options presented Sally indicated that she would need a couple days to review the materials as she had been out of the office until the present time Sally continued to follow up with Sandra on her progress the following day I continued to follow up with Sandra to provide a status update On Monday May th Bryce Baxter Sandras supervisor received a letter of resignation without prior discussion of Sandras resignation intent As a result the process has been stopped

EOPS salary survey questionnaire Cc need to establish a deadline Will Friday March th work Forwarded by Kim MelodickHOUECT on PM Kim Melodick PM To Bob CT Robert CT Leslie CT Sheila CT Kristin CT Brenda F CT D Todd CT Brent A CT Michael E CT Stephen P CT Mary CT Scott CT cc Sally CT Norma CT Yvonne CT Subject EOPS salary survey questionnaire Attached you will find the salary survey questionnaire for your review You will need to fill out the questionnaire for each exempt job group in your department Please be as specific as possible to ensure we are capturing all the skills needed to accurately price the job If you have filled out the questionnaire in the past you may want to update the information I will be happy to address any questions you have regarding the form

EOPS salary survey questionnaire Cc will find the salary survey questionnaire for your review You will need to fill out the questionnaire for each exempt job group in your department Please be as specific as possible to ensure we are capturing all the skills needed to accurately price the job If you have filled out the questionnaire in the past you may want to update the information I will be happy to address any questions you have regarding the form

Executive MBA follow up Cc is in response to your recent request for a status update on Sandra Dial and her desire to pursue an executive MBA program at Rice University In follow up to the discussion held with Sandra Dial Sally Beck and myself on April Sally indicated to Sandra that while she strongly supported the decision made regarding the executive MBA program she agreed to review the proposal of options presented Sally indicated that she would need a couple days to review the materials as she had been out of the office until the present time Sally continued to follow up with Sandra on her progress the following day I continued to follow up with Sandra to provide a status update On Monday May th Bryce Baxter Sandras supervisor received a letter of resignation without prior discussion of Sandras resignation intent As a result the process has been stopped

New Hire Report for Energy Operations Cc the beginning of the new year you expressed your desire to have a report developed which captured all new hires for Energy Operations weekly This report needed to include all transfers in and out of Energy Operations as well After speaking to Alexus about your request she had indicated that she may have a report already developed to meet your needs I encouraged her to speak to you regarding any additional details that that may be needed Alexus agreed to follow up to further assess your needs Please let me know how I may help with the process

EOPS salary survey questionnaire Cc will find the salary survey questionnaire for your review You will need to fill out the questionnaire for each exempt job group in your department Please be as specific as possible to ensure we are capturing all the skills needed to accurately price the job If you have filled out the questionnaire in the past you may want to update the information I will be happy to address any questions you have regarding the form

FW analyst and associate picks for Presto Cc the information I sent to Karen Buckley on Kevins preferences for the new analyst and associates starting in August Kevins group has also identified several summer interns that they would be interested in as well I will forward the names of those indiduals to you as soon as possible Karen please provide Louise and John with copies of the resumes Kevins group selected for the summer interns Please feel free to contact me should you have additional questions Original Message From Melodick Kim Sent Monday April PM To Buckley Karen Subject analyst and associate picks for Presto Here is the rank ordering of Presto s August AA picks Top D Dupre M Taylor W IZ S Pan A Ahmed E Anderson Z Costello A Day G Giron M Marquez S Dicke W Freije W Gurrola S Hermani D Jenkins T Lindvall T Lowell M Philippov R Williams S Yaman J Young

RE AssocAnalystssent this info as discussed to Karen last week who prepared spreadsheet for Lavo I think the question now is how many and what will be the placement I also have identified several needs for Summer Interns in Fundamentals and Realtime Lloyd Will went through the resume book to pick summer interns for Fundamentals provided you concur and the plan was to have Rika use them for analytical work during the summer backfilling them with Strong AAs from the Fall group if needed Juan Hernandez called me regarding adding a summer intern or two for the nightshift for confirmations etc Just to let you know I developed a spreadsheet with the help of Lloyd and Tom May outlining the entire Power team to track all our openings and help us orchestrate the movement of employees through power so the groups wont struggle with being short This also will help all of our recruiters Johnny Charles Karen Buckley and the program folks stay focused on our needs Original Message From Presto Kevin Sent Thursday May PM To Lavorato John Buckley Karen Cc Melodick Kim Subject AssocAnalysts I would like Analysts and Associates I provided my top wish list to Lavo last week Thanks

RE List of Accomplishmentsimmediate action requiredThanks a million Original Message From Benson Robert Sent Monday July PM To Melodick Kim Subject RE List of Accomplishmentsimmediate action required List of accomplishments for Rob Benson Made a fast and profitable transition from cash cinergy trader to term PJM trader Current PL is over budget for the year was set at No losing months worst month was positive Very high return on VAR dont have actual numbers sorry Done two customer load following deals both have turned out to be very profitable Exceeded all EOL goals both number of trades and volume Each month Im in the top in east power for number of trades and volume Have always stayed within my VAR limits I have become the market for all PJM trades both on and off peak My PL has come from intraday trading as well as an underlying fundamental position in both on and off peak PL did not come from just one big move Have always put on positions based on my fundamental view even if that view differed from others on the desk Original Message From Melodick Kim Sent Friday June AM To Irvin Steve Williams Jaime Abler William Aucoin Berney C Robinson Mitch Scheuer Janelle Clynes Terri Will Lloyd Llodra John Gilbertsmith Doug Benson Robert Forney John M Tapscott Ron Kroll Heather Marks David Krause Greg Krimsky Steven Mitro Fred Jacoby Ben Tingleaf Drew Dalton III Oscar Fairley David Hill Garrick Henderson Tosha Ward Charles Whitaker Rick Moore John Kellermeyer Dave Cc Slone Jeanie Subject List of Accomplishmentsimmediate action required I have receive a top priority request from Louise Kitchen to obtain the accomplishments for the Commercial Directors in ENA If you have entered this information into the PEP system you will not be required to submit additional information If you have not entered this information into the performance management system please prepare a one page list of your achievements for this review period and send to me by noon July You can send your accomplishments to me via email select confidential under options or in a confidential envelope by runner Your prompt attention is greatly appreciated Please let me know if I can offer any assistance

RE ENA v MillerMichelle I think if we leave this to the traders then the best decision may not be made at this point in time I think this situation needs to be decided by the company due to the impact it may have on bigger issues Let me know if you agree Original Message From Cash Michelle Sent Tuesday November PM To Melodick Kim Subject FW ENA v Miller Please review and let me know what the traders want to do on this by Thursday would be good Michelle Original Message From Linda Broocks ENRON Sent Tuesday October PM To Cash Michelle Cc Bill Ogden Subject ENA v Miller Dear Michelle I just finished my conference call with Liz Miller counsel for Calpine Christina Solomon and Steve Schuler Steve is cocounsel for Miller with Christina Christina had passed along to Liz the various points I made at the meeting last week so Liz was prepared to address our primary concerns She made the following points She has talked with several different people at various levels of authority in Calpines trading area and insists that Calpine treats the power grids as completely different regions strategies for which are not shared internally among those regions She asserts that how we do it at Calpine is totally different from Enron since Calpine is trading around a portfolio of assets that we own She asserted that Enron not owning power generation assets trades differently When I replied that Enron does have power generation assets she acknowledged the fact but insisted that Enrons trading style is vastly different due to the difference in emphasis vis a vis the power generation assets Liz claims that Miller works almost exclusively in Urcot sp in Texas with some participation in Entergy in Louisiana According to Liz Calpines strategies concerning these specific regions is divorced from and not related in any way with any trading Calpine does in the East or West Liz is of the opinion that Miller is not senior enough that we would be looking for what he knows He has no role whatsoever in discussing or formulating strategy for trading Miller she insists is on the receiving end only He takes orders dispatching and scheduling solely in response to orders he receives from others Liz acknowledges that were Miller in a more senior responsible position she would have the same concerns we are expressing were the tables turned Miller is so slotted however that she believes that he is not in a position to use any Enron trade secret that he might possess though she and Millers attorneys expressed doubt that he could retain any critical information that the most critical information changes on a daytoday basis We ended the conversation with the following understandings Liz will explore whether Calpine could put Miller in a nontrading function for a period of two months or so She hastened to add however that trading is the only area for which they really have any use for Miller She then suggested that she could explore putting him instead in the West I know Enron doesnt even have a western desk here I believe that any proposal she comes back with will entail his continuing in some trading function Liz will try to determine how Calpine might provide assurances acceptable to ENA that Miller is on the receiving end only as she asserts such that we would be confident that he is indeed not in a position to use any trade secrets he may remember On this point I was clear that I did not know either what level of assurance ENA would require or whether this would even be a feasible alternative I am to explore with ENA whether this additional information about Calpines difference in trading strategy and the limitations on Millers duties alleviates ENAs concerns about protection of its trade secrets Liz seems to believe that if the business people really knew the information she is giving to me they would not be concerned about the activities of this low level person Liz has asked that we reconnect later this week to exchange answers to these inquiries I look forward to discussing with you our response Thanks for your assistance Best regards Linda Broocks
